name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coding Timer - Smart Popup and Draggable

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A draggable countdown timer that automatically appears when you access problems on LeetCode, CodeChef, and CodeForces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable, draggable countdown timer that automatically appears when you access problems on any coding platform, assisting you in managing your time efficiently on LeetCode, CodeChef, and CodeForces.
